body:
I recently made a post about the promo / trailer video I made for the Avicus Network around 9 months ago.

Here was the original post: https://avicus.net/forums/c894284c2
Here is the new post: https://avicus.net/forums/855ea6bdb
Here is the video for anyone that hasn't seen it: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zW7J-p0LuXA

Since I have always gotten amazing feedback on it, I was wondering if I should create a new and updated version for newer users and players. I haven't opened minecraft in around 4 months, and haven't played it for longer than 30 minutes in over 7 months, but I am interested in getting back into video editing so I thought maybe I'd give it a shot.

Do you think I should create a new one?
-Sean

Also, for anyone that wants to re-live the moments, here is my old youtube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/user/LegoSean9

title: Thoughts on a New Avicus Promo

replies.body: Yes it would be a great idea to make another one Sean!
replies.body_tagged: Yes it would be a great idea to make another one Sean!

replies.body: Sounds great! Are you thinking of continuing making videos for your old channel?
replies.body_tagged: Sounds great! Are you thinking of continuing making videos for your old channel?

replies.body: Probably not for my old channel. I'm thinking in future i might start streaming, or make a new channel for video edits or something.
replies.body_tagged: Probably not for my old channel. I'm thinking in future i might start streaming, or make a new channel for video edits or something.

reply_to.body: Sounds great! Are you thinking of continuing making videos for your old channel?
reply_to.body_tagged: Sounds great! Are you thinking of continuing making videos for your old channel?

replies.body: Pavilion and I are going to be working on a promo for the server. We have already got a couple of things planned, but we are open to ideas!
replies.body_tagged: Pavilion and I are going to be working on a promo for the server. We have already got a couple of things planned, but we are open to ideas!
